game.name: Pickle Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Pickle Simulator is a Parody game where you can play as a pickle. Navigate between various Pickle Loving Scenes as you get to experience a Simulator Game like never before.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Pickle Simulator is a Parody game where you can play as a pickle. Navigate between various Pickle Loving Scenes as you get to experience a Simulator Game like never before.
